Typealiases.html#/s:14StripeApplePay12ST.name: STPVoidBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:14StripeApplePay12ST.abstract: An empty block, called with no arguments, returning nothing.

Typealiases.html#/s:14StripeApplePay36ST.name: STPIntentClientSecretCompletionBlock
Typealiases.html#/s:14StripeApplePay36ST.abstract: A block to be run with the client secret of a PaymentIntent or SetupIntent.

Protocols/ApplePayContextDelegate.html#/.name: applePayContext(_:didCreatePaymentMethod:paymentInformation:completion:)
Protocols/ApplePayContextDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called after the customer has authorized Apple Pay. Implement this method to call the completion block with the client secret of a PaymentIntent or SetupIntent.

Protocols/ApplePayContextDelegate.html#/.name: applePayContext(_:didCompleteWith:error:)
Protocols/ApplePayContextDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called after the Apple Pay sheet is dismissed with the result of the payment.

Protocols/ApplePayContextDelegate.html.name: ApplePayContextDelegate
Protocols/ApplePayContextDelegate.html.abstract: Implement the required methods of this delegate to supply a PaymentIntent to ApplePayContext and be notified of the completion of the Apple Pay payment.

Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.name: created
Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.abstract: Time at which the object was created. Measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.name: livemode
Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.abstract: YES if the object exists in live mode or the value NO if the object exists in test mode.

Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.name: type
Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.abstract: The type of the PaymentMethod. The corresponding, similarly named property contains additional information specific to the PaymentMethod type.

Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.name: billingDetails
Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.abstract: Billing information associated with the PaymentMethod that may be used or required by particular types of payment methods.

Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.name: customerId
Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.abstract: The ID of the Customer to which this PaymentMethod is saved. Nil when the PaymentMethod has not been saved to a Customer.

Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.name: card
Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html#.abstract: If this is a card PaymentMethod (ie self.type == .card), this contains additional details.

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.name: line1
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.abstract: The first line of the user’s street address (e.g. “123 Fake St”)

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.name: line2
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.abstract: The apartment, floor number, etc of the user’s street address (e.g. “Apartment 1A”)

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.name: city
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.abstract: The city in which the user resides (e.g. “San Francisco”)

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.name: state
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.abstract: The state in which the user resides (e.g. “CA”)

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.name: postalCode
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.abstract: The postal code in which the user resides (e.g. “90210”)

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.name: country
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.abstract: The ISO country code of the address (e.g. “US”)

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.name: Address
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails/Addr.abstract: The billing address, a property sent in a PaymentMethod response

Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails.html.name: BillingDetails
Extensions/StripeAPI/BillingDetails.html.abstract: Billing information associated with a STPPaymentMethod that may be used or required by particular types of payment methods.

Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html.name: PaymentMethod
Extensions/StripeAPI/PaymentMethod.html.abstract: PaymentMethod objects represent your customer’s payment instruments. They can be used with PaymentIntents to collect payments.

Extensions/STPAPIClient.html#/s:10Stripe.name: pkPaymentError(forStripeError:)
Extensions/STPAPIClient.html#/s:10Stripe.abstract: Converts Stripe errors into the appropriate Apple Pay error, for use in PKPaymentAuthorizationResult.

Extensions/STPAPIClient.html.name: STPAPIClient
Extensions/STPAPIClient.html.abstract: STPAPIClient extensions to create Stripe Tokens, Sources, or PaymentMethods from Apple Pay PKPayment objects.

Classes/STPApplePayContext/PaymentStatus.name: error
Classes/STPApplePayContext/PaymentStatus.abstract: The payment failed due to an unforeseen error, such as the user’s Internet connection being offline.

Classes/STPApplePayContext/PaymentStatus.name: userCancellation
Classes/STPApplePayContext/PaymentStatus.abstract: The user cancelled the payment (for example, by hitting “cancel” in the Apple Pay dialog).

Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/s:14Str.name: presentApplePay(completion:)
Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/s:14Str.abstract: Presents the Apple Pay sheet from the key window, starting the payment process.

Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/s:14Str.name: presentApplePay(from:completion:)
Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/s:14Str.abstract: Presents the Apple Pay sheet from the specified window, starting the payment process.

Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/c:@M@St.name: presentApplePay(on:completion:)
Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/c:@M@St.abstract: Presents the Apple Pay sheet from the specified view controller, starting the payment process.

Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/s:14Str.name: apiClient
Classes/STPApplePayContext.html#/s:14Str.abstract: The API Client to use to make requests.

Classes/STPApplePayContext/PaymentStatus.name: PaymentStatus
Classes/STPApplePayContext/PaymentStatus.abstract: An enum representing the status of a payment requested from the user.

Classes/STPApplePayContext.html.name: STPApplePayContext
Classes/STPApplePayContext.html.abstract: A helper class that implements Apple Pay.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
